title: Thai basil chicken with scrambled egg
ingredients: ['2 eggs', '225g cooked white rice', '2 bird eye chillies, or more to taste', '2 cloves garlic, peeled or more to taste', '1 chicken breast, cut into bite-size pieces', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 tablespoons oyster sauce', '1 teaspoon sugar', '14 leaves Thai basil']
